content: MFT-O Omega support profile Hat track - Omega support profile ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Profiles- - - ### FEATURES:Features Labor saving – optimized design help to lower your total cost of installation Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Omega support profile for the second layer of the substructure to build the ventilation space Support profile for the butt joint of the panel Support profile for two-layer horizontal-vertical system ### TECHNICAL DATA:Length: 6000 mmMaterial composition: EN AW-6063 T66Surface finish: flat Technical Data | Length | 6000 mm | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 | Surface finish | flat ### ITEMS- 2029794 - Profile MFT-O 86x25x1,9 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2062591 - Profile MFT-O 40x29,8x2,5 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2062592 - Profile MFT-O 40x29,8x2,5 6m perf. - Package Size 6 m - 2029379 - Profile MFT-O 40x29,8x1,9 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2029380 - Profile MFT-O 40x29,8x1,9 6m perf. - Package Size 6 m
